sentences.sContent: But lowland species with no mountains nearby, such as those in the vast Amazon and Congo basins, will have nowhere to go.
sentences.sContent_eng: But lowland species with no mountains nearby, such as those in the vast Amazon and Congo basins, will have nowhere to go.
sentences.sCn: 但是那些生活在无山区域的低地物种，例如那些生活在广阔的亚马逊和刚果流域的物种，将会无处可逃。

sentences.sContent: In the below video segment from the television series  "Life," you can see western lowland gorillas at a site in the Congo Basin.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the below video segment from the television series "Life," you can see western lowland gorillas at a site in the Congo Basin.
sentences.sCn: 在下面来自电视系列节目“生命”的视频中，你可以看到在刚果贝森地区拍摄到的西方低地大猩猩。

words.tran: 低地的人；苏格兰低地的人
